document.full_text: mr. campbell won a 2008 court ruling to stop the seizure of his land, after he was severely beaten by loyalists of president robert mugabe. he lost the farm anyway.
document.title: mike campbell, zimbabwean farmer who fought land seizure, dies at 78
lines_and_colors: mr. campbell won a 2008 court ruling to stop the seizure of his land, after he was severely beaten by loyalists of president robert mugabe. he lost the farm anyway.
